1.text: Paul, a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of Godâ€™s elect, and the acknowledging of the truth which is according to godliness;

2.text: In hope of eternal life, which God, who cannot lie, promised before the world began;

3.text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching, which is committed to me according to the commandment of God our Savior;

4.text: To Titus, my own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ our Savior.

5.text: For this cause I left thee in Crete, that thou shouldst set in order the things that are wanting, and ordain elders in every city, as I had appointed thee:

6.text: If any is blameless, the husband of one wife, having faithful children, not accused of riot, or disorderly.

7.text: For a bishop must be blameless, as the steward of God; not self-willed, not soon angry, not given to wine, no striker, not given to filthy lucre;

8.text: But a lover of hospitality, a lover of good men, sober, just, holy, temperate;

9.text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught, that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers.

10.text: For there are many disorderly and vain talkers and deceivers, specially they of the circumcision:

11.text: Whose mouths must be stopped, who subvert whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for the sake of sordid gain.

12.text: One of themselves, even a prophet of their own, said, The Cretians are always liars, evil beasts, slow bellies.

13.text: This testimony is true: wherefore rebuke them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith;

14.text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables, and commandments of men that turn from the truth.

15.text: To the pure all things are pure: but to them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure; but even their mind and conscience is defiled.

16.text: They profess that they know God; but in works they deny him, being abominable, and disobedient, and to every good work reprobate.
